splash.headline: [ES] This is your Semblance.
splash.subtext: [ES] A digital representation that understands your world, acts on your behalf, and is architecturally incapable of betraying your trust.

hardware.headline: [ES] Detecting your hardware...
hardware.subtext: [ES] Semblance will recommend the best model for your machine.

data_sources.headline: [ES] Connect your world
data_sources.subtext: [ES] Everything stays on this device. Semblance connects to your accounts through the Gateway, fetches your data, and stores it locally.
data_sources.more_sources: [ES] + 42 more sources available in Connections after setup
data_sources.privacy_notice: [ES] Your data never leaves this device. Connections are encrypted and revocable at any time.
data_sources.nudge: [ES] Connecting at least one source helps Semblance understand your world. You can always add more later.

autonomy.headline: [ES] How much should it do on its own?
autonomy.subtext: [ES] You can change this anytime in Settings. Most users start with Partner.

guardian.name: [ES] Guardian
guardian.description: [ES] I'll show you everything before I act
guardian.detail: [ES] Every action requires your explicit approval. Full control.

partner.name: [ES] Partner
partner.description: [ES] I'll handle the routine, check on the important stuff
partner.detail: [ES] Routine tasks run autonomously. Novel or high-stakes actions need approval.

alter_ego.name: [ES] Alter Ego
alter_ego.description: [ES] I'll handle everything, interrupt only when it matters
alter_ego.detail: [ES] Most users start with Partner and move here within a few weeks.

naming_moment.headline: [ES] What should it call you?
naming_moment.confirmation: [ES] Your Semblance will address you as {{name}}. You can change this in Settings.

naming_ai.headline: [ES] What will you call it?
naming_ai.subtext: [ES] This is what your AI will be called. You can change it in Settings.

initialize.downloading_subtext: [ES] Downloading models and preparing your knowledge graph. This may take a few minutes.
initialize.ready_subtext: [ES] Connect more data sources later to unlock deeper insights.
